title: Would you like to join the Keycloak team? We're hiring!
content: Red Hat continues its investment in Red Hat Single Sign-On and are looking to hire a number of engineers to work directly with the Keycloak project to continuously improve the project, as well as work on new capabilities.  There are a number of openings on the teams responsible for development of Red Hat Single Sign-On, and maintaining Red Hatâ€™s own deployments and integrations of Keycloak.
